import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PostService from '../PostService'; import {Card,Nav,Navbar,NavDropdown,Dropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' const postService = new PostService(); class ImagePostList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { posts: [], }; } componentDidMount() { var self = this; const postService = new PostService(); postService.getImagePosts().then(function (result) { console.log(result); self.setState({ posts: result.data}) }); } render(){ return( Home
Docs Upload Images Videos Docs


{/*
Home
Docs(current) Upload
All Videos Images Docs
{this.state.posts.map( c =>

{c.Name}

{c.Description.substring(0,10) + "..."}

Posted by { " " + c.Author + " " } on {" " + c.Init_time.substring(0,10)}

)};
*/} Filter by Videos Images Docs

Image posts

{this.state.posts.map( c => {c.Name} {" " + c.Init_time.substring(0,10)} {c.Description.substring(0,10) + "..."} Details )}
); } } export default ImagePostList;
